name: Kafka to Pub/Sub
description: Streaming pipeline. Ingests JSON-encoded messages from Kafka to a Pub/Sub subscription

parameters.name: bootstrapServers
parameters.label: Kafka Bootstrap Servers
parameters.helpText: Comma separated Kafka bootstrap servers in format ip:port

parameters.name: inputTopics
parameters.label: Kafka input topics
parameters.helpText: Comma separated Kafka topics to read data

parameters.name: outputTopic
parameters.label: Pub/Sub output topic
parameters.helpText: Pub/Sub topic to write the output, in the format of 'projects/yourproject/topics/yourtopic'

parameters.name: outputFormat
parameters.label: Message format that is written into Pub/Sub
parameters.helpText: One of two message formats that is written to Pub/Sub. PUBSUB or PLAINTEXT. Default is PLAINTEXT

parameters.name: secretStoreUrl
parameters.label: URL to credentials in Vault
parameters.helpText: URL to Kafka credentials in HashiCorp Vault secret storage in format 'http(s)://vaultip:vaultport/path/to/credentials'

parameters.name: vaultToken
parameters.label: Vault token
parameters.helpText: Token to access HashiCorp Vault secret storage

parameters.name: truststorePath
parameters.label: Truststore Path
parameters.helpText: The path to the trust store file

parameters.name: truststorePassword
parameters.label: The password for the trust store password
parameters.helpText: Token to access HashiCorp Vault secret storage

parameters.name: keystorePath
parameters.label: The path to the key store file
parameters.helpText: Token to access HashiCorp Vault secret storage

parameters.name: keystorePassword
parameters.label: Keystore Password
parameters.helpText: The store password for the key store password

parameters.name: keyPassword
parameters.label: Key Password
parameters.helpText: The store password for the key store password
